text: Meghan King Edmonds continues to stick her foot in her mouth with comments about RHOC cast by Tiffany Bailey Even Danielle Staub said it, there are no ‘ wallflowers ’ on Season 8 of RHONJ and that is going to make for some explosive TV. After the first few episode of RHONJ have aired, fans of the Bravo series have found themselves taking sides in the growing war between Siggy Flicker and Margaret Josephs. It turns out that the RHONJ cast are also taking sides and Danielle Staub making it very clear who she thinks is right and who she thinks is wrong in this latest reality TV drama. Danielle ’ s return to Real Housewives of New Jersey as a friend of the cast has been interesting. For starters because when she left after Season 2
